original_text: The king replied, “You are a very bad servant! I will use your own words to show you that you have done the wrong thing. You say that I tell people what they should do all the time. That I take things that I did not work for. That I take food from fields where I did not plant any seed. Did you know all that about me?
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 악한 종아 내가 네 말로 너를 심판하노니 너는 내가 두지 않은 것을 취하고 심지 않은 것을 거두는 엄한 사람인 줄로 알았느냐

sentences.original_text: You are a very bad servant
I will use your own words
to show you that you have done the wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 잘못된 일을 했다는 것을 너에게 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: You say that I tell people what they should do all the time
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 말하기를 내가 항상 사람들에게 무엇을 해야 하는지 말한다고

sentences.original_text: That I take things that I did not work for
That I take food from fields where I did not plant any seed
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 씨를 심지 않은 밭에서 음식을 가져간다고

sentences.original_text: Did you know all that about me?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나에 대해 그 모든 것을 알고 있었느냐?
